content: Would someone mind point me to a decent place to start on #74970, assuming it's something T-compiler wants?
I don't know the right approach, but I suspect https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/87487 touches much of the relevant code, it might give you ideas

Nothing seems super obvious to me in that PR, but I'm also not familiar with how things currently work. The new rustc_resolve/src/access_levels.rs file looks like somewhere the change might be implemented, though. that would require the PR landing first, of course.
